name: Villager
desc: Nothing special

name: Cop
desc: Can visit someone each night to investigate them
Investigations tell the cop the target's alignment (village, mafia, or third party)

name: Doctor
desc: Can visit someone each night to protect them
Protection saves the target from death that night
Protection saves the target from infection that night
Cannot choose self
Dying does not stop protection, but roleblocking does

name: Bodyguard
desc: Can visit someone each night to guard them
If target is killed, 50/50 chance for the bodyguard or attacker to die
Cannot choose self

name: Lookout
desc: Can stalk someone each night
Stalking does not count as a visit
Receives a report of who visited them
Report will also tell if the target visited someone, but not who
Can choose self

name: Vigiliante
desc: Can choose someone each night to shoot
If target is innocent, commit suicide

name: Sheriff
desc: Starts off with a gun
Gun will reveal the Sheriff's identity

name: Gunsmith
desc: Can give someone a gun each night
An announcement is made every time a gun is obtained
Cannot choose self

name: Blacksmith
desc: Can give someone a vest each night
Can choose self

name: Mafia
desc: Can kill someone each night along with other mafia
Attends mafia meetings

name: Stalker
desc: Can stalk someone each night
Stalking does not count as a visit
Receives a report of who visited them
Report will also tell if the target visited someone, but not who
Can choose self

name: Hooker
desc: Can roleblock someone each night
Roleblocking prevents all night actions, such as investigations or doctor protections

name: Lawyer
desc: Can make a fellow mafia appear innocent on cop reports each night
Detectives will see villager
Cannot choose self

name: Janitor
desc: Can clean up a murder once per game
If cleaned up, only the Janitor will know the role and alignment of the mafia kill target

name: Bomb
desc: If killed, explodes
Explosion will kill the attacker and self
If protected, attacker still explodes
Identical to Villager

name: President
desc: President's identity is visible to all villagers
President can broadcast a single message at the beginning of the game
If killed, mafia win instantly

name: Sniper
desc: Starts off with a gun
Gun will not reveal the Sniper's identity
Attends mafia meetings

name: Bulletproof
desc: Starts off with a vest
thats it lmao yep nothing else just a vest
literally nothing different its just that bro get pranked
Identical to villager

name: Jailer
desc: If no lynching, Jailer can jail someone each day, and target will be jailed the next night
Jail target cannot perform night actions and is immune to night actions
Jailer's identity is unknown to the target
Jailer and target can communicate
Jailer can release or execute the target
Cannot choose self

name: Killer
desc: Must kill someone each night
Kills are higher priority than mafia kills
Wins if last one standing

name: Fool
desc: Must visit someone each night
Wins if lynched

name: Yakuza
desc: Once per game, can convert the mafia kill target into mafia
Conversion does not kill the mafia target
Commits suicide upon conversion
Icon contributed by DemonPumpkin

name: Surgeon
desc: Once per game, can visit and revive a dead person

name: Amnesiac
desc: Once per game, can visit and steal a dead person's role
If target is revived, they will be revived into an amnesiac
Cannot win as amnesiac

name: Cultist
desc: Can convert someone into cultist each night
If visited by a Mason, cultist dies
If the original Cultist dies, all Cultists die
Attends Cultist meetings
Wins if cultists outnumber everyone during day

name: Mason
desc: Can recruit and convert someone into Mason each night
If recruiting a mafia-sided role, or Killer, all masons die
If recruiting a Cultist, cultist dies
Attends Mason meetings

name: Drunk
desc: Can roleblock someone each night
Roleblocking prevents all night actions, such as investigations or doctor protections

name: Granny
desc: Will shoot anyone who visits her
Cannot die during the night
Can be converted, but will shoot the converter
Visits self if visited
Visitors will visit themselves

name: Godfather
desc: Appears innocent on cop reports
If visited, mafia will not kill

name: Celebrity
desc: Role is visible to everyone at all times

name: Kidnapper
desc: Can kidnap someone once per game
Kidnapped target will not be able to see or talk in day chat the next day

name: Supplier
desc: Can give a mafia member a gun or vest each night
Gun will always reveal identity, and will not kill a mafia member
Cannot choose self

name: Diplomat
desc: Visits someone once per night
If target is a visiting role, they will be forced to visit the Diplomat

name: Illusionist
desc: Visits someone once per night
Target will appear guilty on cop reports

name: Tailor
desc: At the start of the game, can make someone appear as another role
Any actions they perform will not work

name: Zombie
desc: Converts one person to Zombie each night
If host Zombie is killed, village instantly win
Host zombie is immune to corporal kills
Attends Zombie meetings
Must outnumber villagers to win
Cannot win if corporal is alive
Contributed by DemonPumpkin

name: Corporal
desc: Immune to Zombie infection
Cannot kill the host zombie
Contributed by DemonPumpkin

name: RandomVillager
desc: Not an actual role, just used as a filler for setups where a random village-sided role is chosen

name: RandomMafia
desc: Not an actual role, just used as a filler for setups where a random mafia-sided role is chosen

name: infinixius
desc: Immune to death (except suicide)
Starts off with a gun and vest
Cannot be lynched
Immune to infection and conversion
Can kill, roleblock, investigate, and protect someone each night
Can see all night meetings
Will learn the names of everyone who visits them
No random critical hits
